name: Sausage
description: Don't like round flat red meat? Try crumbly brownish grey meat.

name: Veggie
description: Killin' animals to gnosh on not your cup o' tea? We'll throw the garden on your pie instead.

name: Supreme
description: The veggie, but with more supremacy.

name: Supreme with the Meats
description: No moral dilemma for you in your pizza choice AND you like the garden stuff? This one's for you.

name: The Beast
description: Everything. Literally every topping we offer here. All the toppings.
